description: Least number which becomes prime or 4 after exactly n iterations of f(x) = sum of prime factors of x.
comments: f(x) = sum of prime factors with multiplicity, so that f(1500) = 2+2+3+5+5+5 = 22.Identical to the different-offset A121360 except for the second term. - Hans Havermann, Oct 05 2010a(20) <= 536226160966. a(21) <= 2681130804805. a(22) <= 8512643845707. - Donovan Johnson
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: Edited comment and a(18)-a(19) from _Donovan Johnson_, Oct 16 2010
